aboutProject.heading: Mayelana Nephrojekthi
aboutProject.paragraph1: I-Orbital Temple iwumsebenzi wobuciko kanye nesathelayithi okuhloswe ngayo ukuba yithempeli elibandakanya wonke umuntu, elakhiwe lapho izindonga zingafinyeleli khona. Idalwe yiciko lase-Brazil u-Edson Pavoni, umdwebi ngemva kwe-Inumeráveis Memorial efinyelele umuntu oyedwa kwabangu-6 baseBrazil ngesikhathi sobhadane lwe-COVID, le phrojekthi imema abantu abavela emhlabeni wonke ukuthi bathumele igama lomuntu abafisa ukumkhumbula. Lawa magama adluliselwa ku-satellite ku-orbit, okwenza isikhumbuzo esihlangene.
aboutProject.paragraph2: Ngewebhusayithi etholakala ngezilimi ezingu-136, ababambiqhaza bahlanganyela ohlotsheni olusha lwesiko. I-Orbital Temple ihlola amatimu okufakwa, inkumbulo, nobuntu bethu okwabelwana ngabo, ibuza ukuthi kungani lingekho ithempeli elingokoqobo eMhlabeni elingamukela wonke umuntu ngempela, futhi liphakamisa isikhala njengendawo okuwukuphela kwayo lapho kungaba khona ukuhlanganisa okukhulu.

aboutArtist.heading: Mayelana Nomculi
aboutArtist.paragraph1: U-Edson Pavoni uyiciko lase-Brazil ohambo lwakhe lwaqala emigwaqweni yase-São Paulo, lapho umongo wobumpofu nobudlova wakhela iminyaka yakhe yokuqala. Ezweni lapho ubuKristu bunikeza indlela ekude nemigwaqo, izidakamizwa, nobudlova, uPavoni wathola isiphephelo okholweni, isihloko okwakuyothi kamuva, lapho esengumgxeki wokuhlukunyezwa kwenkolo, azise umkhuba wakhe wobuciko.
aboutArtist.paragraph2: Ngo-2020, phakathi nobhubhane lwe-COVID-19, uPavoni wadala i-Inumeráveis (ingenakubalwa) , umsebenzi wobuciko ezimpambanweni zobuciko nobuntatheli. Le phrojekthi ixoxisane nezinkulungwane zemindeni futhi yabhala izindaba zalabo abalahlekelwe yilolu bhubhane, yakha isikhala lapho inkumbulo yedlula izinombolo nezibalo. Izinkondlo, amaculo, nama-symphony enziwa ngalezo zindaba. Amaphephandaba adala amakhava esebenzisa amagama nemilando. Zonke izihlabani zaseBrazil ezifana no-Oscar owina uFernanda Torres, nezihlabani ezifana noSelton Melo, Eva Wilma, Camila Pitanga, Debora Secco, Tais Araujo noLazaro Ramos, kanye nabanye abaningi abafunda lezo zindaba kumabonakude kazwelonke. Le phrojekthi ifinyelele abantu abayizigidi ezingu-32, oyedwa kwabane abadala baseBrazil. Kwaba inethiwekhi yokuphulukisa, isikhumbuzo esihlangene enkumbulweni.
aboutArtist.paragraph3: Ngemva kwezingxoxo zosizi ezingaphezu kwezinkulungwane eziyishumi, kwavela isibonelo: lapho sikhuluma ngothile ofile, sikhetha izingcezu zendaba yakhe njengokungathi sibhalela umlindisango wepharadesi incwadi yokutusa. Senza konke okusemandleni ethu ukubathumela kulokho esikholelwa ukuthi yizulu. Lo msebenzi wavusa ukuqonda okusha: Izinkolelo zethu mayelana nokuthi ubani ofanelwe izulu zilolonga ngokuqondile ukuthi ubani esimamukelayo noma esingabafaki ngaphandle Emhlabeni. Amakoloni angamaPutukezi eBrazil ayekholelwa ukuthi abantu abaMnyama abanamiphefumulo; leyo nkolelo yayithethelela ubugqila. Uma wawungowomdabu, uma wazalelwa endaweni engafanele noma uthanda umuntu ongafanele, namanje, kuze kube namuhla, utshelwa ukuthi iminyango yezulu ivaliwe kuwe. Ingabe ukhona umbono wekusasa ongagcwaliswa ukwenqatshwa?

team.heading: Ithimba
team.content: I-Orbital Temple idalwe ngokubambisana noSathi Roy, uPedro Kaled, uJoão Pedro Polito, uVictor Baptista, uJoão Victor Alves, u-André Biagioni, u-VK, u-Jonathan Querubina, u-Guilherme Bullejos, u-Eduardo Dias, uRoberta Savian Rosa, uClara Marques, uDaphne Alves, uFlavio Pedro Vidigal Vigal Putti, Rafael Fernandes, Bruna Cairo, Solid Concepts, RiseNY&Partners, IdeaSpace, nabo bonke labo abaqhubeka nokuphakamisa amagama aleli thempeli.

pressCoverage.heading: Okufakiwe Ku / Cindezela Ukusabalala
pressCoverage.paragraph1: Ukusakazwa kwabezindaba nezici zizongezwa njengoba zitholakala. Ukuze uthole izibuyekezo zakamuva, sicela uxhumane nethimba lethu labezindaba.
pressCoverage.paragraph2: Imibukiso yangaphambilini nezici zihlanganisa izethulo ku-13th Mercosul Bienal, ukuqashelwa okuvela kumklomelo we-Lumen, nokukhethwa yi-Brazilian Institute of Space Research (INPE).

images.intro: Zonke izithombe ziyatholakala ukuze zisetshenziswe ukuhlela. Chofoza noma yisiphi isithombe ukuze ulande ifayela lokucaca okuphezulu.
